dmca.title: [EV1-C1544047L] Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com
dmca.body:
This is correct, He moved his content to servers in the UK (217.11.233.231) at approx 10:45 on October 29th so he can resume his attacks on our company from outside the US where it will be infinitely more difficult to stop him. However, his domain name is still hosted by your company (Public Domain Registry). Can you please tell me how we can seize this domain name so we can stop this at the root of the problem. We have a court order in progress against this person, but it will take until Thursday or Friday of this week to complete this court/legal process. Is there anything we can with the domain name registered at your location to if he does come back up in attack mode in the UK? Thanks, Chris -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, October 30, 2006 12:48 PM To: chris@discountspasdirect.com Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org Subject: FW: [EV1-C1544047L] Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com Please note that the website referenced in your DMCA notice does not reside within our network as of 1:47:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on October 30, 2006. Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 11:51 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1544047L] Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com Subject: [EV1-C1544047L] Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com Added by system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 07:53 am X-MailFrom: chris@discountspasdirect.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Oct 26 03:25:24 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:24:42 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:24:42 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from chris@discountspasdirect.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Gd0Xa-0006HH-58 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:24:42 -0500 Received: from fed1rmmtao06.cox.net ([68.230.241.33]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from chris@discountspasdirect.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gd0XN-0009Q6-76 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:24:29 -0500 Received: from fed1rmimpo02.cox.net ([70.169.32.72]) by fed1rmmtao06.cox.net (InterMail vM.6.01.06.01 201-2131-130-101-20060113) with ESMTP id <20061026082316.JXAK6235.fed1rmmtao06.cox.net@fed1rmimpo02.cox.net> for ; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 04:23:16 -0400 Received: from main ([70.162.26.115]) by fed1rmimpo02.cox.net with bizsmtp id ewPL1V0072V0Phy0000000 Thu, 26 Oct 2006 04:23:20 -0400 From: "Chris Ormiston" To: Subject: Attack on DiscountSpasDirect.com Date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 01:23:15 -0700 Message-ID: <01d001c6f8d7$fc42c850$3202a8c0@main> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_01D1_01C6F89D.4FE3F050" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Thread-Index: Acb41/wACaNGr1U1RTaX2f+Df8upnw== Received-SPF: unknown (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: error in processing during lookup of domain of discountspasdirect.com: DNS lookup failure) client-ip=68.230.241.33; envelope-from=chris@discountspasdirect.com; helo=fed1rmmtao06.cox.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Oct 2006 08:24:42.0250 (UTC) FILETIME=[2FA366A0:01C6F8D8] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Alexey Sergeev who is apparently one of your customers has duplicated our website and cloaked it with a javascript which creates duplicate content. This duplication of content has gotten us knocked off of Google and Yahoo in the last 24 hours. Our company has come to a complete hault. We will be seeking legal action against Alexey, however in the mean time, we would like your cooperation in shutting down his servers so we can try and rebuild our rankings which may take months. Here is the offending website http://www. hot-tubs.quck.info If you look at them on Google and click the Cached link...you will see our website (which is what google sees) however the actual website is cloaked. http://www.google.com/search?q=hot-tubs.quck.info &start=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:offici al This is a deliberate attack on our company. Please let us know as soon as the servers are down. Here is the information for the offender: WHOIS INFORMATION ------------------------------------------- Whois lookup for quck.info Domain ID:D14320739-LRMS Domain Name:QUCK.INFO Created On:07-Aug-2006 14:29:34 UTC Last Updated On:11-Oct-2006 18:39:45 UTC Expiration Date:07-Aug-2007 14:29:34 UTC Sponsoring Registrar:Direct Information Pvt. Ltd. d/b/a PublicDomainRegistry.com (R159-LRMS) Status:OK Registrant ID:DI_3124473 Registrant Name:Alexey Sergeev Registrant Organization:NA Registrant Street1:5 av. st. 14 Registrant Street2: Registrant Street3: Registrant City:New York Registrant State/Province: Registrant Postal Code:10576 Registrant Country:US Registrant Phone:+1.9188457659 Registrant Phone Ext.: Registrant FAX: Registrant FAX Ext.: Registrant Email:alex@pharmainc.biz Admin ID:DI_3124473 Admin Name:Alexey Sergeev Admin Organization:NA Admin Street1:5 av. st. 14 Admin Street2: Admin Street3: Admin City:New York Admin State/Province: Admin Postal Code:10576 Admin Country:US Admin Phone:+1.9188457659 Admin Phone Ext.: Admin FAX: Admin FAX Ext.: Admin Email:alex@pharmainc.biz Billing ID:DI_3124473 Billing Name:Alexey Sergeev Billing Organization:NA Billing Street1:5 av. st. 14 Billing Street2: Billing Street3: Billing City:New York Billing State/Province: Billing Postal Code:10576 Billing Country:US Billing Phone:+1.9188457659 Billing Phone Ext.: Billing FAX: Billing FAX Ext.: Billing Email:alex@pharmainc.biz Tech ID:DI_3124473 Tech Name:Alexey Sergeev Tech Organization:NA Tech Street1:5 av. st. 14 Tech Street2: Tech Street3: Tech City:New York Tech State/Province: Tech Postal Code:10576 Tech Country:US Tech Phone:+1.9188457659 Tech Phone Ext.: Tech FAX: Tech FAX Ext.: Tech Email:alex@pharmainc.biz Name Server:NS1.QUCK.INFO Name Server:NS2.QUCK.INFO Thanks, Chris Ormiston Owner Discount Spas Direct LLC MIME element (text/html)
Alexey Sergeev who is apparently one of your customers has duplicated our website and cloaked it with a javascript which creates duplicate content.  This duplication of content has gotten us knocked off of Google and Yahoo in the last 24 hours.  Our company has come to a complete hault.  We will be seeking legal action against Alexey, however in the mean time, we would like your cooperation in shutting down his servers so we can try and rebuild our rankings which may take months.
 
Here is the offending website
http://www.hot-tubs.quck.info
 
If you look at them on Google and click the Cached link...you will see our website (which is what google sees) however the actual website is cloaked.
 
http://www.google.com/search?q=hot-tubs.quck.info&start=0& ;ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:of ficial
 
This is a deliberate attack on our company.
 
Please let us know as soon as the servers are down. 
 
Here is the information for the offender:
